skins.selfIntroduction: Royal Navy H-class destroyer, Hunter. I was taken down by Iron Blood destroyers in the battle of Narvik. It's nothing new for a hunter to end up being eaten by their prey...
skins.acquisition: Hello, Commander. I'm Hunter... Was there something else I was supposed to say...?
skins.login: Commander. How about we go hunting?
skins.details: Commander, I'm pretty proud of my trophies... Would you like to take a look?
skins.secretaryIdle1: This guy over here? He's my treasured companion.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I don't dislike Hardy. It's just that she tends to be annoying when she's around.
skins.secretaryIdle3: These clothes...? Commander, you don't have to copy my dress when we go hunting.
skins.secretaryTouch: This isn't a hunting rifle. It's a torpedo tube.
